name: part_012
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performs 'Mada, Aoi' during her 4th Anniversary 3DLIVE 'Aqua-iro Festival'.
A brief pause with a fade to black before the announcement section.
Announcement for Minato Aqua's 4th Anniversary commemorative goods.
Promotion for the digital release of the song 'Mada, Aoi'.
Announcement for the console game 'Aquarium' and its various store bonuses.

subtitles.original: 明日はもっと 君のそばへ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, I'll be even closer to you

subtitles.original: 前へ そう前へ
subtitles.english: Forward, yes, forward

subtitles.original: 少しずつ進んでいく
subtitles.english: Moving forward little by little

subtitles.original: 一歩 五十歩 百歩 踏み出して
subtitles.english: One step, fifty steps, a hundred steps, taking a leap

subtitles.original: 揺らめいている君が
subtitles.english: You, who are wavering

subtitles.original: 青く滲む 青く滲む 綺麗に
subtitles.english: Bleed into blue, bleed into blue, beautifully

subtitles.original: 会いに行く 会いに行こう 今すぐ
subtitles.english: I'm coming to see you, let's go see you, right now

subtitles.original: 波白く さざめく音に 耳を立てて
subtitles.english: Whiting waves, listening to the rustling sound

subtitles.original: 赤く、青く、夕映えの空 昇る星
subtitles.english: Red, blue, the twilight sky, the rising stars

subtitles.original: 不思議と 不安な旅も 怖くないから
subtitles.english: Strangely, even an uncertain journey isn't scary

subtitles.original: 手を振って 俯かないように 歩いていく
subtitles.english: Waving my hand, walking so as not to look down

subtitles.original: 「憧れても、願っても 誰にもなれないな」
subtitles.english: "Even if I admire, even if I wish, I can't become anyone else"

subtitles.original: それだったら 自分になってみよう
subtitles.english: In that case, let's try being myself

subtitles.original: そうやって
subtitles.english: That's how

subtitles.original: 目指した今日を 飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Leaping over the today I aimed for

subtitles.original: 明日はきっと 会えるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm sure we can meet tomorrow

subtitles.original: じゃあね、そうしたらね、一緒に 何を話そう
subtitles.english: Well then, in that case, what shall we talk about together?

subtitles.original: 一歩 五十歩 百歩 重ね合って
subtitles.english: One step, fifty steps, a hundred steps, overlapping

subtitles.original: 紡いでいく時間が 溶けていく 溶けていく
subtitles.english: The time we spin is melting, melting away

subtitles.original: それでも いつかは 夢が 終わるなら
subtitles.english: Even so, if the dream must end someday

subtitles.original: それでも良いかな 君がいるんなら
subtitles.english: I guess that's okay, if you are here

subtitles.original: 世界の中で 出会えた君が 理由になったら
subtitles.english: If you, whom I met in this world, become my reason

subtitles.original: それでも良いよね
subtitles.english: Then it would be alright, wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: 一人の今日を 飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Leaping over my solitary today

subtitles.original: 描いた今日を 通り越して
subtitles.english: Going past the today I drew

subtitles.original: 明日はもっと 君のそばへ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow, I'll be even closer to you

subtitles.original: 前へ そう前へ
subtitles.english: Forward, yes, forward

subtitles.original: 少しずつ進めよ
subtitles.english: Let's move forward little by little

subtitles.original: 一歩 五百歩 千歩 繰り返して
subtitles.english: One step, five hundred steps, a thousand steps, repeating

subtitles.original: 指に触れる君が
subtitles.english: You, whom my fingers touch

subtitles.original: 青く滲む 青く滲む 綺麗に
subtitles.english: Bleed into blue, bleed into blue, beautifully

subtitles.original: いつまでも そばにいて 良いかな
subtitles.english: Can I stay by your side forever?

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ 活動4周年記念 8月8日 販売開始
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua 4th Anniversary Celebration - Sales start August 8th

subtitles.original: 活動4周年記念フルセット / 記念グッズ3種
subtitles.english: 4th Anniversary Celebration Full Set / 3 types of commemorative goods

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ「未だ、青い」 ダウンロード＆ストリーミング配信中！
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua 'Mada, Aoi' - Now available for download and streaming!

subtitles.original: あくありうむ。 完全生産限定版 Hololive Official Edition
subtitles.english: AQUARIUM Limited Edition - Hololive Official Edition

subtitles.original: あくありうむ。 店舗特典 / 描き下ろしアイテム
subtitles.english: AQUARIUM Store Bonuses / Original illustrated items
